summary: Iteration 7 testing completed. All new features working: 1) Feed Refresh button shows toast notification, 2) The Vouch page displays correctly with plates count and Create/Redeem functionality, 3) The Sidebar page for 1-on-1 whispers works, 4) Whisper button appears on other users' profiles, 5) Spark posts contain culturally diverse content (POC/BIPOC focused), 6) Trending and auto-spark endpoints return diverse news. Fixed one bug: Redeem plate error handling was crashing React.

Backend: /api/vouch/plate/my-plates returns user's plates
Backend: /api/vouch/plate/create creates new plate and decrements count
Backend: /api/vouch/plate/redeem rejects invalid codes (404)
Backend: /api/sidebar/my-sidebars returns user's sidebars
Backend: /api/sidebar/create rejects self-sidebar (400)
Backend: /api/sidebar/create works with other users
Backend: /api/spark/categories returns culturally diverse topics (POC/BIPOC focus)
Backend: /api/spark/trending returns diverse news headlines
Backend: /api/spark/drop creates spark post with reference URL
Backend: /api/spark/auto generates multiple diverse posts from different categories
Backend: /api/posts/feed returns posts including spark posts
Backend: /api/posts/explore returns public posts
Backend: /api/users/profile/{username} returns user profile with plates_remaining
Frontend: Login flow works correctly
Frontend: Home page loads with feed
Frontend: Feed Refresh button shows 'Feed refreshed!' toast notification
Frontend: The Vouch page displays at /vouch with plates count
Frontend: Create Plate button works and decrements plates count
Frontend: Redeem Plate code input exists and handles errors gracefully
Frontend: Active Plates section shows created plates with codes
Frontend: Sidebar page displays at /sidebar with whisper list
Frontend: Whisper button appears on other users' profiles (e.g., Bonita)
Frontend: Spark posts show culturally diverse content (#BlackLit, #POC, #BIPOC, #BlackExcellence)
Frontend: The Word trending section shows diverse hashtags
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: VouchPage.jsx redeemPlate function was sending code in request body instead of query parameter, causing FastAPI validation error that crashed React when trying to render error object
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test plates during testing (codes: R5XLVK48, 4W2C5CHD). Generated multiple spark posts via auto-spark endpoint.

mocked_apis.notes: S3 cloud storage is ready but using local fallback (no AWS credentials). NewsAPI integration prepared but not active. DuckDuckGo search is used for real-time news in Spark posts.
